com.interpss.dstab.controller.block

Interface ICMLStaticBlock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, ICMLBlock
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICMLControlBlock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BusFreqMeasurementImpl, CMLControlBlock1stOrderAdapter, CMLControlBlockAdapter, CMLStaticBlockAdapter, DelayControlBlock, FilterControlBlock, FilterNthOrderBlock, GainBlock, IntegrationControlBlock, PIControlBlock, TFunc2ndOrderBlock, WashoutControlBlock

    public interface ICMLStaticBlock
extends ICMLBlock
    We have two basic concepts: Block (StaticBlock and ControlBlock) and Function Block is two-way, which means you can find y from u and u(0) from y(0) Function is only way. You can only find y from a set of u(s). So function cannot put in the main path between RefPoint and Controller output
